pageProduct.name: Pevaryl Cream 1% 20G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pevaryl Anti-Fungal Cream is for the treatment of fungal skin infections such as athlete's foot, tinea and ringworm as well as other candidal complaints.

Pevaryl Anti-Fungal cream is for the treatment of fungal skin infections such as athlete's foot, tinea and ringworm as well as other candidal complaints.

Size: 20g

KEY FEATURES

• Pevaryl Anti-Fungal Cream contains econazole nitrate 1% w/w
• Helps prevent immediate fungal reocurrences with continued use
• Simple, easy to apply cream

Warnings

For external use only.
Contains benzoates.

CAUTION

Pharmacy Medicine
Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Econazole Nitrate 1% w/w

Contains: Contains benzoates.

Directions

Apply to affected areas 2 to 3 times a day. To prevent recurrence, continue to apply Pevaryl Anti-Fungal Cream for 14 days after the symptoms disappear.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
